about_the_game:
When the humans found that harnessing spirit souls could power their Silkpunk machines, the world changed forever.
Now being a Yokai roaming the land is a death sentence.
Play as Lionna, the last kitsune in existence, on her journey to free other Yokai from captivity.
Explore a world filled with mystery and strife.
Build a safe haven for stranded Yokai, and in return, they will craft your armor and weapons, teach you magic, and tell you the secrets of the world.
Fight or Trick your way through the great human strongholds and become more powerful.
Parkour across a rich landscape, overcoming every obstacle on your way.
Forge a legacy in this epic adventure where your choices will influence the co-existence of humans and spirits.
“Carve Lionna’s journey from a clumsy cub to a kitsune Goddess!”

name: Yokai Tales: Fox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64 Bit)
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Yokai Tales: Fox is a deep action RPG that tests your discipline, resilience, and skill in agility and combat. Embody the last Kitsune, on her quest to save spirits from the cruelty of humans. Rebuild their lives, learn unique techniques, and ascend to a Nine-Tailed God.
